row.scheme:
;; transpose output (define start (d-GetNote)) (d-MoveCursorRight) (define end (d-GetNote))
(if (or (string=? start "") (string=? end "")) (d-GetUserInput (_ "No Transposition Interval") (_ "To use this function you need to place the cursor\non the first of two notes which define\nthe transposition required") (_ "Ok")) (d-StaffProperties (string-append "staff-prolog-insert \\transpose " start " " end)))
row._tooltip: Transpose this staff in the print out. The cursor must be on the first of two notes that define the interval to use.
